text: Scalar SELECT with an alias * This is where a SELECT statement that returns a SCALAR (single row and column) is used as an attribute: SELECT staff name, staff role, (SELECT staff name FROM b2 staff boss WHERE boss.staff no = emp.reports to ) AS answers to - FROM b2_Staff emp; P * Staff_no * Staff_name Staff_role ! F Reports_to ' v | | | Gaauasns o
